channel.title: Does OpenEars require internet access to when using? – Politepix

item.title: Does OpenEars require internet access to when using?
item.dc:creator: natalie
item.description:
Hi,

Currently I am evaluating some text to speech engine to be used for an iPhone app and OpenEars sounds like a great app to use. However, can I confirm that OpenEars does not require internet connectivity to run the text to speech? The engine and the data are included in the iPhone application itself?

Thank you.

item.title: Reply To: Does OpenEars require internet access to when using?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description: Correct, it does nothing over the network.

item.title: Reply To: Does OpenEars require internet access to when using?
item.dc:creator: Saatyagi
item.description:
Hi,

I’ve purchased RapidEars licence for bundle id and now we’ve to change that bundle id for security reasons.

Can you help me understand if if can be changed from old to new one ?

item.title: Reply To: Does OpenEars require internet access to when using?
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Greetings,

Sorry, it isn’t possible to change a bundle ID after purchase.
